alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 05 at 11:03PM AKDT until October 06 at 7:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing Rain. Additional ice accumulation up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Copper River Basin. * WHEN...Until 7 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy road conditions have been reported on the Glenn Highway from Sheep Mountain east to Glennallen. Icy road conditions have also been reported on the Richardson Highway south of Glennallen. Incoming warmer air this morning will assist in the transition from freezing rain to rain, and warm frozen surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
